paper_abstract: This paper concerns the existence and multiplicity of positive solutions for a class of m-point singular boundary-value problems of second-order differential equations Lx=lambda w(t)f(t, x), 0<t<1. The arguments are based upon fixed point theorems in a cone. The nonexistence of a positive solution is also studied. (C) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Positive solutions for a class of m-point singular boundary value problems
